sentences: Minu ema alati seib vastu helistamisele kell 7, see on ta kaks tundi juba seisan.
Ta jõi, et mässas teekond ja saab seisan sisse.
context: 'Seisan' is the first person past tense of 'seisa,' meaning to stand. It is commonly used in narration or recounting events where someone has been in a standing position.
